title: Cell Culture Supernatant Collection
procedures:
This protocol has been performed using human embryonic stem cells \(hESCs), neonatal rat ventricular myocytes \(NRVMs), and KMBC cholangiocarcinoma cells.
1. On Day 1, plate cells at a concentration of 1 million cells / mL.
  2. 24 hours after plating, switch to serum-free or EV-cleared media.
  3. Collect supernatant after 24 hr \(hESCs) or 48 hr \(NRVMs or KMBCs).
  4. Centrifuge at 500 x g for 10 min.
  5. Transfer supernatant to a fresh tube and centrifuge at 2,000 x g for 10 min. 
  6. Store cell-free supernatant at -80Â°C.
